website_summaries.verdict: The LG G Pad 7.0 is a basic budget tablet that slightly outmatches its competition with a supremely comfortable build, modest software extras and bargain-basement pricing.
pros: The LG G Pad 7.0 starts at $150 and its simple design is comfortable to hold
It has an IR blaster, a microSD card expansion slot and an IPS screen with wide viewing angles
It also features dual-window functionality and comes in a 4G LTE version
cons: The Wi-Fi model has only a paltry 8GB of internal storage
The screen is slow to respond when switching orientation and the rear speakers are easily blocked when you hold the tablet in landscape

customer_reviews.title: IR Blaster is hardware encrypted and locked, can not use 3rd party control remote apps. DONT BUY..
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this tablet for the IR Blaster, so I could use it to control my TV, Cable box and Stereo, well, the IR Blaster is LOCKED by LG (according to xda devs is hardware encrypted, you can search around if don't believe me), so the IR blaster can't be used with 3rd party apps. This tablet comes with QuickRemote from LG and the IR blaster only works with this app, and this app sucks big time, it only supports some 6 TV brands nothing more. If you are buying this tablet for its IR blaster look somewhere else, don't buy it, you'll be disappointed as I was. I'm returning it...
customer_reviews.author: M. Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Tablet NOT working less than ONE MONTH after purchase!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday, April 1st... this tablet just died... the screen went black and did not come back on again after 6:00 p.m. EST. I'd been reading on it during my commute from work and closed it after getting off the train. Much later last night around 11:00 p.m. as I picked up the tablet to put it away; I felt a lot of heat emitting from the battery. I just bought this tablet; ordered on February 28th, 2019 and received it on March 4th, 2019. What do I do now that it's stopped working less than a month after making this purchase?!?!?!?!?!?!? I'm disappointed and annoyed at this happening so quickly after making this purchase!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ASH218

customer_reviews.title: If You're Shopping for a Bargain Priced Tablet, You Can Do Better Than This
customer_reviews.text: I had for 3 days and decided to return it. There's nothing dramatically wrong with it. Its beautifully designed and has low price point relative to its most important attributes: Bright screen, decent snappiness, and trusted brand. But what led me to return it was: > I found that 8 GB just wasn't enough for me. > The Google Nexus 3 always keeps you at the most up-to-date version of Android. While the Google tablet was not as pretty, I'm glad I match the switch.
customer_reviews.author: PositiveLogic

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet for my 7 year old son in August 2014 and he's put it through the ringer. He runs the battery completely dry, he's dropped it 40+ times, and the screen gets so dirty you can't even see through it. But it keeps running great. The downside is the storage is pretty small, but if you're not storing a lot of apps or pics on it, its a great, durable tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Neal

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Buying.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second LG tablet, a giveaway with a phone purchase, and the old one is still going after 4 years so I am using it with the same model as a back up. Wonderful, and small enough to fit in my small purse (in comparison to most ladies purses) to take with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tehachapi

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Lollipop Tablet for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Best Lollipop tablet for the money and from reputable company like LG!!! Ever since the update from Jelly Bean to Lollipop, the experience with the tablet had surprised me!!! The resolution was well sufficient enough to my eyes to watch smooth video and made the Lollipop GUI shine. It did not take the best pictures but for a tablet used for the usual browsing, emailing, watching streaming videos, and listening to music, it was a well deserved tablet. It was packed with more features that I didn't need but they may come in handy soon (like IR remote). I also used it for Android development.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: below my standards
customer_reviews.text: what an aggravating device. first you have lg's idea of what should happen to Android, and then you have an inability to even utilize the SD card for most of the apps. you get a pretty terrible camera with a high noise profile, a mono speaker, sluggish performance (even after you disable lg's idea of multitasking). I want to like it. the hardware is OK and it is a lollipop device. I know it's cheap and I shouldn't expect much, bit this thing hit far below the mark for me. what a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: kristopolous

customer_reviews.title: LG's people were nice but unable to resolve the issue
customer_reviews.text: It's very well made and the interface is well-designed, but I only give it 3 stars due to: 1) The "knock code" did not work out of the box and required several factory resets and software upgrades before it started working. LG's people were nice but unable to resolve the issue. 2) The IR blaster cannot be used as a universal remote as implied. The LG QuickRemote App will only control the major TV and Cable Box models and most 3rd party Apps state they will not work with the LG G Pad due to some proprietary code. After resolving the "knock code" issue, I'm impressed with the speed and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hyper mother mode
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought the LG tablet my parents both have and I got it at this price I'm pretty happy about it they've had theirs for a while with no problems my mom even threw hers across the house from the second level of the house in the dinnet to the front room a few months ago and it suffered no damage (mom gets pretty mad)
customer_reviews.author: rebecca k.

customer_reviews.title: This is a freaking awesome tablet. The only negative is the 8gb storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a freaking awesome tablet. The only negative is the 8gb storage. They should not make tablets with 8gb anymore. Other than that its a beautiful tablet with remarkable speed and resolution. The only reason I got it was because of the price. I got it for $55.00 through a third party seller. I would definitely recommend getting the 8 inch version. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Adams

customer_reviews.title: Lack of storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tablet except for the lack of storage. It comes with 8GB and can support up to a 32GB Micro SD card. Unfortunately the inability to move most applications from the main storage to the sd card storage makes it where you are limited on how many apps you can install and get update errors due to storage capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead Pixels
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this product 2 stars based on the fact that I received this product with about 4-5 dead pixels. Which is disappointing considering the actual tablet itself is excellent,especially for the low price.if I want so upset that the screen has dezd pixels I would have gave this 5 stars because this is a great beginner tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet for the price. 8GB is a bit on the low end, but I use a 16G SD card and move some apps to the card to maintain free space. Screen resolution and quality is sharp and brilliant. Good battery life. Comfortable to hold and plastics are high quality. Sound volume is ok. Could use bit more power. I'm very pleased with this LG tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Colors are clear
customer_reviews.text: We already had an LG through our phone company, but wanted one that was wifi only. After doing a lot of research, we kept coming back to the LG. Love it. Colors are clear, the battery lasts a long time, and you can add up to 32 GB storage if you need more space. It's like an android, easy to use for downloading games, music, and Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Needs memory card
customer_reviews.text: It only has 8g of memory, but 5g of that memory is used woth system files that you can't delete. So you pretty much end up with onky about 2.5g which is garbage. So if you buy this do your self a favor and buy a memory card with it.
customer_reviews.author: Reneta  A. Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Handy size.
customer_reviews.text: Am loving this pad. This is my 5th pad and by far the easiest to use. Comes with a nice assortment of handy apps, but not a bunch of useless apps you will never use. Small enough to fit into the pocket of cargo shorts, even in a case. Enough larger than your smartphone to not get eyestrain.
customer_reviews.author: Dptrs

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good cheap Android tablet. Don't expect the quality of an iPad from this device. The only thing I don't like about it is the quality of speakers. It actually has just one speaker. Very poor sound quality. But love it as a very cheap tablet for leisure acivities.
customer_reviews.author: Hovakhshatareh

customer_reviews.title: The device is better than I expect
customer_reviews.text: I am a Chinese consumer and really appreciate the great production quality from Korean I update the system to cyanogenmod and it works perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good enough tablet for casual use, but rather slow and limited storage capability without an additional memory card
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Smedberg

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It was better than I thought it would be. The resolution is extremely sharp and I like the idea of dual screen multitasking. Has great sound quality and video playback is awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it works great just a little to small screen
customer_reviews.author: gail garcia

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I have ever used !! Only tablet that does not freeze up on my Grandson. Every other tablet we have gotten him has froze up multiple time son him. This one has not tl all !!
customer_reviews.author: Zippybuggy1

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this tablet and could not ask for more especially ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet and could not ask for more especially with the price. It runs smooth and looks smooth. It runs android O.S. 5.0 which is really nice. The only thing I didn't like about this tablet was that it had a hard time loading photos and videos off one of micro sds. Other than that it really is a tablet that is worht the price.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. A 16GB option would be fantastic. Otherwise, a nice piece.

customer_reviews.title: So far she is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the LG LGV LGV400 7-inch 8 GB Tablet for my granddaughter. So far she is very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: ... LG tv and cell phone and have been really happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I have bought an LG tv and cell phone and have been really happy with them. When my Asus tablet quit, I bought this LG tablet and have been super happy with it. It's faster, does more, is lighter and more comfortable to hold. The battery lasts forever and charges really quickly. The price was perfect. Definitely get a 32gb memory card. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: LG makes my day, every day
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant tablet and so portable. Love it. Should add a flash to camera next time.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tablet, but only had 3-4 gigs of user storage

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for price. Kind of slow and confusing t9 navigate though.

customer_reviews.title: Great game table To!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a grandson-he uses it to play his favorite games on and has it with him all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A George

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this tablet for my daughter (6) and son ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet for my daughter (6) and son (3) as a Christmas gift. It's been fairly decent for a kid's tablet, but I wouldn't use it for much else. The internal storage capacity is a big issue, and you really need an external SD card if you are going to take more than a few pictures, record video, or want to add an average amount of apps to the device. Some apps won't install on an external storage device, so you can still run out of room even if you do add in a SD card. The device software takes up a very large chunk of the internal storage, so you don't get full use of the 8GB.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Snow

customer_reviews.title: Not enough space
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend buying a SD card with it. I couldn't download one movie. Looks nice. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: JIPF

customer_reviews.title: It works great. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.text: It works great. What more can I say? Good tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Hereticus

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet. Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we needed. Nice tablet. Inexpensive. Easy to use. No problems with it so far. The kids finally have their own device and I can keep my phone. My two year old uses it most.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This a very good tablet, with good price too, i love it

Has an IR blaster built in that allows me to control devices that can't be controlled through WIFI over home network. Reasonably fast response and priced cheaply.

customer_reviews.title: The tablet is nice with cool features like remote control & side by ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is nice with cool features like remote control & side by side apps but do yourself a favor & avoid the upgrade (DOWNGRADE) of Lollipop. Look online at reviews of OS Lollipop & u will c it only takes away from the user satisfaction of this tablet. I would also recommend 16GB cause u only have 3 & change available to u before upgrade (DOWNGRADE) & less after. A sd card helps but u r still limited in playstore.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great tablet for its price. Not too big or small, fits nicely in hands feeling good. Its easy to set up within a minute after turning it on. Already have few apps on it and it last for a while. Bout to get a emulator to play old sega,ps1,n64 games:) ya. Its my favorite tablet ive got to have and use. For a tablet being this price id say its worth it. This is a awsome xmas gift i bought myself.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Battery life is great
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Battery life is great. I only wish it had the option of having 16 GB's for internal memory.

customer_reviews.text: I was rather disappointed with this Tablet. It locked up several times and in the end it was unable to recognize the SD card. I ended up returning it and the refund procedure went perfectly.

customer_reviews.text: Ms represented as the tablet is NOT UNLOCKED, I reached out to the cellular provider but with no avail as the seller has an outstanding balance hence they can't unlock the device. So I am stuck between a rock and a hard place

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment...
customer_reviews.text: Three days later to receive the tablet, I could not charge it. The charge pin sucks! I received my refund but I passed a bad moment.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Not enough internal memory
customer_reviews.text: 8GB of internal memory is not enough for android 5 that uses 4GB. After a few apps I have just 1.4GB left even though I am moving as many apps as possible to the 64GB external memory card. This tablet should be at least 16GB internal memory. Other than this critical point, is ok.
customer_reviews.author: A F.

customer_reviews.title: Big Mistake
customer_reviews.text: A basic e-reader. You can not add a data plan to this tablet which makes it pretty useless to me. Unfortunately, I can't return it due to the return policy by Amazon. It would be helpful to show in the description that it does not contain a sim card and you can not add one.
customer_reviews.author: S. T.

product_meta.title: LG G Pad V400 7-Inch 8GB Android Tablet PC w/ Qualcomm Snapdragon 1.2GHZ Quad-Core CPU - Black
product_meta.description:
LG knows you are always on the go and the LG G Pad 7.0 provides the ultimate tablet for life on the fly. Secure, Simple Ways to Wake and Unlock Your Tablet with Knock Code, Control Compatible Devices with Quick Remote, Seamless Connectivity with your Android Smartphone with Pair 2.0

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: 8 GB Flash Memory, 1 GB RAM Memory
